CreateIdleInstanceCuller.title: CreateIdleInstanceCuller
CreateIdleInstanceCuller.summary: Creates an automatic stop policy for a specific Data Science Workshop (DSW) instance. When the conditions are met, the instance is automatically stopped. You can create only one automatic stop policy for an idle DSW instance. If the specific instance has an automatic stop policy, call DeleteIdleInstanceCuller to delete it first.

CreateInstance.title: CreateInstance
CreateInstance.summary: Creates a Data Science Workshop (DSW) instance.

CreateInstanceShutdownTimer.title: CreateInstanceShutdownTimer
CreateInstanceShutdownTimer.summary: Creates a scheduled stop task for an instance.

DeleteIdleInstanceCuller.title: DeleteIdleInstanceCuller
DeleteIdleInstanceCuller.summary: Deletes the automatic stop policy of an instance.

DeleteInstanceLabels.title: DeleteInstanceLabels
DeleteInstanceLabels.summary: Delete tags from a Data Science Workshop (DSW) instance.

DeleteInstanceShutdownTimer.title: DeleteInstanceShutdownTimer
DeleteInstanceShutdownTimer.summary: Deletes a scheduled stop task of an instance.

GetIdleInstanceCuller.title: GetIdleInstanceCuller
GetIdleInstanceCuller.summary: Queries the information about an auto stop policy for a specific idle instance.

GetInstance.title: GetInstance
GetInstance.summary: Queries the details of a DSW instance.

GetInstanceEvents.title: GetInstanceEvents
GetInstanceEvents.summary: Queries a list of system events for a Data Science Workshop (DSW) instance.

GetInstanceMetrics.title: GetInstanceMetrics
GetInstanceMetrics.summary: Queries the resource metrics of an instance.

GetLifecycle.title: GetLifecycle
GetLifecycle.summary: Obtains the lifecycle of an instance

GetToken.title: GetToken
GetToken.summary: Obtains the temporary authentication information of a DSW instance.

ListEcsSpecs.title: ListEcsSpecs
ListEcsSpecs.summary: Queries a list of specifications of ECS instances.

ListInstances.title: ListInstances
ListInstances.summary: Queries a list of Data Science Workshop (DSW) instances.

UpdateInstance.title: UpdateInstance
UpdateInstance.summary: Updates the properties of a DSW instance.

UpdateInstanceLabels.title: UpdateInstanceLabels
UpdateInstanceLabels.summary: Updates the tags of a Data Science Workshop (DSW) instance. If the tags do not exist, the system adds tags.
